overview:
Nima is the technology mastermind behind Clever Sense Platform. He is a deep thinker and a guru in machine learning and data mining technologies. For the past 7 years he has been crafting intelligent agent architectures capable of learning and decision making for his PhD research at Stanford University. Such technologies are also at the heart of the Clever Sense platform. When not thinking about technology, he finds inspiration on long walks on the beach in Half Moon Bay, or in art museums.

Nima is also is a member of the Product Design Committee at Clever Sense.

Nima holds a master’s degree in EE and is a PhD candidate at Stanford. His latest publications on machine learning can be found here.
